name: Parlor! Pro 6
overview: Parlor! Pro 6 is the sixth game of the series of the same name released for the Playstation console and is a gambling game that features 2 different gambling machines (Bouken Ima & Jawara Kids). The game features also a sort of a story mode with a vertical shooter. In each planet he can go around and play in the pachinko machines to win new prizes.
